body:
Version of go source: 1.4.2
Version of Windows: Windows 8.1 64 bit ( Language: Korean )
Failure type:
The first test fails with 'path xxx not found' like message.
The error message is broken at the non-Latin word part.
Because of this error, I changed my Windows user name and
I cannot provide the precise error message at this time.
I will follow up with the reproduced message later.
